**Play Music**:
Plays the song of your choice
`Usage = mc!play <song>`
**Pause Music**:
Pauses the currently playing song
`Usage = mc!pause`
**Resume Music**:
Resumes the currently playing song
`Usage = mc!resume`
**Join vc**:
Bot joins your current vc
`Usage = mc!join`
**Leave vc**:
Bot clears the queue and leaves your vc
`Usage = mc!leave`
**Queue**:
Shows all the music queued to the bot
`Usage = mc!queue`
**Remove song**:
Removes the song from queue at a specified index
`Usage = mc!remove <index>`
**Volume**:
Changes the volume of the song at a specified value
`Usage = mc!volume <number>`
**Now**:
Shows the currently playing song
`Usage = mc!now`
